column4: <a|3x> i got a problem with firewire, sudo lspci shows a firewire device but ive got no 1394 in /dev/, anybody care to help?
i didnt need to back scroll
i dont use firewire so i cant tell you
what device are you trying to use
have you plugged somthing in
ok then well best of luck with that
you mean in lsmod
like dv1394.ko
just did, looks like i got it to work, testing captured video now...
nice
why lsmod not show it?
me was helpful :)
it probably does
try lsmod | grep 1394
i got ieee1394 and ohci1394
i got ieee1394 and ohci1394
ok then when you modprobed raw1394 it possible loaded those modules instead for you a|3x
no, when i did that nothing appeared in /dev/
but you can now use your dv cam?
<a|3x> oobe:  just did, looks like i got it to work, testing captured video now
ye it works
how do i make it modprobe raw1394 at boot?
well i wouldnt worry about /dev/ it knows what its doing udev creates what it needs there not stuff just to confirm you have hardware
thanks for your help
